unnormalised: Campus hiring remains a crucial talent acquisition strategy, especially for fresh graduates from institutions like IIT Delhi. Companies visiting campuses in places like Pune and Chennai can tap into a diverse pool of talent. Remuneration packages starting from Rs. 5 Lakhs per annum are now standard. We see a "3 Idiots" effect, inspiring students. Streamlining the selection process, potentially reducing it to 3 days, will increase efficiency. This benefits both recruiters and candidates.
